newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Merrill cuts energy producers.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Merrill cuts energy producers.

text.p: -- Merrill Lynch said Tuesday it had cut its ratings on six oil- and gas-producing stocks.
-- Merrill cut Vastar Resources Inc to near-term neutral from accumulate. Its long-term rating remained buy. Vastar closed Monday at 38-3/4.
-- Seagull Energy Corp was downgraded to near-term neutral from accumulate. It was kept at long-term buy. Seagull closed at 22-1/8.
-- Pogo Producing Co was cut to near-term neutral from accumulate. It was kept at long-term buy. Pogo closed at 47-7/8.
-- Merrill cut its rating on Mesa Inc to near-term neutral from accumulate. The stock was kept at long-term accumulate. Mesa closed at 5-1/2.
-- Enserch Exploration Inc was cut to near-term neutral from accumulate. It was kept at long-term accumulate. Enserch closed at 11-1/2.
-- Apache Corp was downgraded to near-term neutral from accumulate. It was kept at long-term buy. Apache closed at 35-7/8.
